amendment.description: Amendment reduces the appropriation for military construction for the Army by $14 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funds appropriated for Army military construction by $14 million, from $626 million to $612 million. The intent of the amendment would be to delete funds for land acquisition on which to construct a National Museum of the United States Army.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Herger amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 261 - 137 (Roll no. 388).
